really fun game...

i recommend this game for evrybody
awesome played it for hours

Embora continuações de jogos que fizeram sucesso, não sejam bem recebidas, essa foi muito bem elaborada, e com um npc muito mais participativo, portal 2 traz a mesma sintonia que encontramos no primeiro, com puzzles mais elaborados e a história que te atrai até o final.
This is a really good game, It takes a while to really learn, but once you played for a while, everthing just feels natural.
игра класс, играю с друзьями и один
If you like sci-fi and to use many minutes, or probably hours solving riddles... Then THIS is the game for you!!!

I enjoyed Portal and so I picked this up on sale.  It is a good solid game with a witty story, so it is fun to play.  Took me 11 hours to finish the whole single player.  Some of the levels obviously were more challenging than others, that took like 5 seconds to get through.  Maybe one or two levels gave me actual difficulty, but mostly due to very large space and trying to find the spot to place a portal. The last level gave me some trouble and I died twice while trying to complete it.
It is still a fun puzzle game and a nice story.  I am interested to play co-op mode, but haven't had a chance.  The community also is great and there are a lot of levels for download.  So, looks like a really good buy on sale.
加速凝胶棒极了

THIS IS A GAME FOR GENIUSES AND PATIENT PEOPLE!!! seriously though, i would recommend this game to anyone looking to kill some time on the pc and/or just really like confusing puzzle games such as this

what can i say AWESOME GAME!!!!!

Одна из моих любимых игр в Steam
Некоторые плюсы +
-Коперативное прохождение кампании
-Очень много карт (Для одиночки и коператива) 
-Редактор карт (Создай свою карту)
-Офигенная графика (Лучьше чем в первой)
-Озвучки на всех языках
-Интересная компания
Некоторые минусы -
-Их нет
PLEASE PLAY THIS GAME FOR WHEATLY

if you like to slove puzzles and feel proud of yourself afterward then here's a game for you. The ending was pretty charming. i loved the story line, and i finally get the refrence of the lemons in portal.
One of the best puzzle/platformer games of all time.  I have nothing bad to say about it.  Great storyline, great mechanics, and great levels.  10/10

Muy buen juego, una verdadera evolución con respecto a su predecesor.
Aunque hay detalles del portal 1 que me gustaron mas y tiene uno o dos errores de continuidad con la historia de portal 1, pero eso no significa que no sea bueno.
Si no has jugado y terminado el portal 1 no entenderas el 2, créeme, asi que si quieres jugar este sin saber nada del otro, pierdes tu tiempo.
Awesome 11/10

Possibly one of the greatest games I've ever seen, good fun, amazing gameplay, funny dialog, overall a supurb time.  Adding onto Portal's interesting storyline, Portal 2 is sure to not dissapoint.  Adding a multiplayer and community made levels.
Эта веселая головоломка долна быть у каждого в коллекции !!!

My ass got destroyed by not LEAVING the chair while playing.
10/10 - Amazing
Le 1 est excellent. Le 2 l'est encor plus ! On s'attache vraiment aux personnages qui possèdes un doublage Francais fonctionnant a merveille ! +1 pour les éléments du gameplay vraiment accrocheur !

Portal 2, what can I say about this game. For starters IT'S FREAKING AWESOME!! The story is very well writen, and the characters are very well developed. The gameplay feels very natural and it has a very good difficulty. Every chamber is difficult enough to make you think but not difficult enough to make you rage quit. The co-op is the iceing on the cake, get it cake, it forces real communication bettween players and it is very fun with a similarly skilled friend. I definately recommend this game.
games to fun but the game is to easy make it hard

Steven Mangan reprises his award winning role in this sequel to Valve's seminal Hitchhiker's-Guide-to-the-Galaxyian take on the innovative first person shooter map construction format. Would not recommend.
GET IT NOW
Просто великолепная игра! Одиночный режим очень интересен, мультиплеер вообще улет! Игра полностью заслуживает того, чтобы ее купили!
One of the better games that I have played in my life. If you dont have it, BUY IT!
Jeu sympas et bien pensé, le mode coop peut-etre un peu trop court

Toujours aussi drôle et mettant la réflexion au centre de son gameplay, Portal 2 est la digne suite de Portal. A faire et refaire surtout en coopération !

Note : 17/20
K rozsudku nad pokračováním, které překročilo stín prvního dílu, nám stačí uzmout z kontextu hlášku jedné ze zúčastněných postav: “Tohle je umění.”
puzzeling
Intant classic
Portal 1 est un chef d'oeuvre et Portal 2 est encore mieux !

Portal 2 is a fun game that engages your mind. There are a few good plot twists and the game mechanics are fun. The only complaint I have about Portal 2 is that it is short. I have only 2 hours clocked in and I am about one-third through the game. i got it for $4.99 during a steam sale. I think it is worth $19.99, its full price. Buy this game and start thinking with portals!

How can you not feel sorry for Valve? This was the last game they actually made, :( I hope in the near future, they will make a game at least as good as Portal 2. We want more original Valve brand games!!! (At least i do :P)
Melhor jogo de puzzle ever!
IS GOOD
Really good game 10/10 hardly any bugs, puzzles are balance and progressivly get harder and hugely satisfying end result
Really Really Fun, Enjoyed the "Friendship" I had with GLaDOS, enjoyed the puzzles, enjoyed the game.
Gutes spiel

Игра просто отличная, даже можно сказать: ШИКАРНАЯ никаких притензий, очень долго ждал когда будет акция. И вот, этот прекрасный день настал! Ноги в руки и бегом покупать, скачал, наслаждаюсь продуктом, но игру уже проходил (Пиратка), так что, в кратце расскажу, начало очень интересное и и появляется много вопросов, например: Что это за шар? Какого черта ему нужно? Как я тут оказался? где ГлАдос, и думаю самый главный вопрос, Что сдесь черт возьми происходит? Мне игра понравилась, так что, ставлю ей 10/10 я большой фанат порталов :D а особенно мне понравился CO-OP и эти миленький роботики :3 ми-ми-ми.
IT'S AWESOME!!!!!!!
Amazing game and story with an excellent conclusion.
when i press play it loops diiferent audio tracks and after 5 mins it carshes my pc and shows the blue screen. can anyone please  help?

a part of my childhood was spent in Portal 2, all I could get was the plot holes of the game. Now, as a grown up person, I see how deep and excelent the writing in this game is. This is one of the few games that put a smile on my face trough its humour.

An absolute beautiful game. Well developed, nice graphic, creative gameplay, fun puzzle, immersive character and story. Another must-have game from Valve. Trust me, you gonna be amazed by this work of art. 10/10

เกมส์นี้จะเเน่นไปเเนว ปริศนา ใช้สมองชะส่วนใหญ่เเละถามว่าชื้อมาเนี้ยคุ้มใหม? ผมบอกเลยว่าคุ้มมาก!
โดยตัวเกมส์หลังนั้น เนื้อเรื่องผมว่าใช้ได้เลยเเละอนิเมชั้นของวัตถุต่างๆสมจริงมาก

ถ้าเทียบกัย Portal กับ Portal 2 เเล้วผมว่าเลยว่า Portal 2 พัฒนาไปเยอะมากเลยที่เดียว
โหมด CO-OP ก็สนุกใช้ได้จะยากตรงหาเพื่อนที่มีเกมส์นี้ด้วยนั้นสิ หาคนเล่น รวมกันยากนุดๆสำหรับผม

โหมด เวิร์กชอป ที่ไปโหลด map จากคนอื่นมาก็ใช้ได้เลยมี map ให้เลือกมากกว่า 10000 หน้า เเต่ละหน้าก็จะมาอย่างต่ำก็ 20 30 ด่าน
บอกเลยว่ามี map เสริมให้เล่นอีกเพียบบบบบบ จะเยอะไปใหนนนนนนนน

เเละเกมส์จากค่าย Valve ต้องมีพวก Easter eggs มาให้เราได้ค้นพบหรือหามันหรือไปหาในเน็ตอื่นๆอีก

ถ้าให้คะเเนนนะผมให้เลย 9/10 คะเเนน
เเล้วอีก 1 คะเเนนที่ลดมันมีปัญหาอะไรหรอ?
ผมขัดใจตอนจบมาก มาถึงตรงนี้ถ้าใครยังเล่นไม่จบ อย่าอ่านนะครับมันอาจจะสปอนให้คุณหมดสนุกนั้นเอง

Probably one of Valve's many greatest games. This game (and franchise) includes a great number of puzzles that challenges your mind, finding a way to solve it. This is an amazing sequel to it's first game. Keep it up, Valve!

Never before have I laughed so much during a computer game. This is absolutely brilliant, fun and challenging.
Both single player and multiplayer works well. - Oh and you can make your own maps...

People always ask me how I have spent so many hours in this game? Here are the reasons:

- Replaying the amazing singleplayer story
- Replaying the amazing multiplayer story
- Playing lots of custom maps (single- and multiplayer)
- Making custom maps ( http://steamcommunity.com/id/sponska3/myworkshopfiles/ )
大家玩这款游戏最大的不满大概是3d眩晕症。我要告诉没玩过的朋友们，这不是问题！这是紧凑的解密游戏，你的注意力很快就会被有趣的谜题和滑稽的配音给转移了。

This is one of the most creative games i have ever played. 

This is a new and improved Portal game, with single player campaign that continues the story from Portal 1, a new co-op campaign. The developers have basically given us Portal 3, when they gave us the level editor. Hundreds of thousands of community made levels are now playable. 

Thank you Valve for this AWESOME GAME!!! I highly recommend everyone to play the Portal franchise.

10/10 

PS. I still prefer if Valve makes Portal 3.

I just bought this game, well the bundle that included both portal 1 and 2. It was my first time playing them and loved the story in them. The second one is way better than the first one. This one took me 9.9 hours to complete the game, well take alittle due to eating and other things alike. But i would recomend to play both at the same time only because you will get the whole story of it and how it started. Want to play Co-Op so bad with a friend so it should be fun.
